1: -module(cache_server_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: 
    5: -compile(export_all).
    6: 
    7: all() ->
    8:     [{group,test}].
    9: 
   10: groups() ->
   11:     [
   12:         {test, [sequence], [
   13:             start,
   14:             insert,
   15:             lookup,
   16:             lookup_by_date
   17:         ]}].
   18: 
   19: start(_Config) ->
   20:     {ok, _Pid} = cache_server:start_link(test, [{drop_interval, 3600}]).
   21:     
   22: insert(_Config) ->
   23:     {ok, _Pid} = cache_server:start_link(test, [{drop_interval, 3600}]),
   24:     ok = cache_server:insert(test, key1, value1, 60),
   25:     ok = cache_server:insert(test, key2, value2, 600),
   26:     ok = cache_server:insert(test, key3, valye3, 6000).
   27: 
   28: lookup(_Config) ->
   29:     {ok, _Pid} = cache_server:start_link(test, [{drop_interval, 3600}]),
   30:     ok = cache_server:insert(test, key1, value1, 60),
   31:     ok = cache_server:insert(test, key2, value2, 600),
   32:     ok = cache_server:insert(test, key3, valye3, 6000),
   33:     {ok, Value1} = cache_server:lookup(test, key1),
   34:     {ok, Value2} = cache_server:lookup(test, key2),
   35:     {ok, Value3} = cache_server:lookup(test, key3).
   36: 
   37: lookup_by_date(_Config) ->
   38:     {ok, _Pid} = cache_server:start_link(test, [{drop_interval, 3600}]),
   39:     ok = cache_server:insert(test, key1, value1, 60),
   40:     ok = cache_server:insert(test, key2, value2, 600),
   41:     ok = cache_server:insert(test, key3, valye3, 6000),
   42:     DateFrom = {{2020,1,1},{00,00,00}},
   43:     DateTo = {{2021,1,10},{23,59,59}},
   44:     {ok, [Values]} = cache_server:lookup_by_date(test, DateFrom, DateTo).
   45: 
   46:
